description:
Learn the basics of making better iPhone videos that will attract prospects and deepen relationships with your current customers, clients, and team members.

Master The Art of Making iPhone Videos From Start to Finish

  • Learn what types of videos you can create
  • Develop a success strategy for using videos
  • Learn how to use the iPhone camera apps
  • Discover simple lighting techniques
  • Learn how to build your own DIY lighting kit
  • Learn how sound can improve your video
  • Learn about different microphones and how to use them
  • Learn how to edit your videos in iMovie
  • Learn how to make different styles of videos
  • Discover how video can build trust with your audience

This course teaches a simple process for lighting, sound, and editing, to make great videos for your business.

This course features real-world examples combined with short instructional lectures to help you gain a better understanding of the video making process. 

After taking this course you'll be able to improve the lighting, sound, and overall look of your videos. You'll improve your knowledge of editing in iMovie and how to capture the best looking video with your iPhone.

You'll discover how fun it can be to make videos for your business with easy tools that don't require much technical skills.
title: Grow Your Business with iPhone Videos
